whoItsFor.studentIntro: Ideal for exchange students, the stopover helps reduce jet lag and ease cultural adaptation. Always accompanied by teachers and Brazilian guides, students will experience:
whoItsFor.studentFeatures1: Accommodation, transfers, and two days of unforgettable experiences.
whoItsFor.studentFeatures2: Visit Education City, one of the largest educational hubs in the world.
whoItsFor.studentFeatures3: Tours to the National Library, Qatar National Museum, and iconic city landmarks.
whoItsFor.studentFeatures4: Visit the modern stadiums of the FIFA World Cup 2022.
whoItsFor.studentFeatures5: 24-hour support, with Portuguese-speaking supervision and local assistance.
whoItsFor.studentFeatures6: Activities in small groups with classmates, ensuring comfort and safety.
whoItsFor.travelerIntro: Perfect for those traveling to Australia to visit children or travelers who want to turn their connection into a discovery opportunity. With exclusive itineraries, you will enjoy:
whoItsFor.travelerFeatures2: Personalized city tours with licensed Brazilian and Qatari guides.
whoItsFor.travelerFeatures4: Free time for shopping, dining, and leisure.

faqestion.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faqestion.visa_doha_question: Do I need a visa for the Doha stopover?
faqestion.visa_doha_answer: Brazilians do not need a pre-arranged visa. Entry is facilitated upon arrival in Qatar.
faqestion.visa_australia_question: Do I need a visa for Australia?
faqestion.visa_australia_answer: Yes. Up Experiences works with specialized partners who have helped hundreds of students obtain Australian visas with a high approval rate, ensuring safety and peace of mind.
faqestion.schools_question: Do you work with schools in Australia?
faqestion.schools_answer: Yes. We partner with English language schools and professional courses recognized for their academic quality and infrastructure. We can advise and recommend the most suitable school for your profile.
faqestion.connection_time_question: What is the minimum connection time needed for the Doha stopover?
faqestion.connection_time_answer: We recommend at least 2 full days, but we also offer itineraries adapted for 24-hour connections.
faqestion.portuguese_guides_answer: Yes, all tours and support are conducted by Brazilian professionals and a bilingual local team.
faqestion.safety_question: Is it safe to travel alone to Doha?
faqestion.safety_answer: Absolutely. Doha is considered one of the safest cities in the world, and you will have 24-hour support from our team.
faqestion.personalized_itineraries_question: Are there personalized itineraries or group departures?
faqestion.personalized_itineraries_answer: Yes. You can choose personalized itineraries, adapted to your time and interests, or join pre-scheduled group departures. Contact our team to confirm upcoming dates.
